phrs.translation: 枫丹白露, 美国原装进口墙纸, 腹锏介湶
自由复兴, 斑马条纹

sentences.sentence: Byzantine costume revealed both Greco-Roman and Oriental influence, combining Roman drapery with the gorgeousness of the East, in heavy silk, damasks, brocades and cloth of gold.
sentences.translation: 拜占庭服装吸收了古希腊和古罗马的风格，受到过东方服装的影响，将罗马的悬垂服装与东方的厚质丝绸，花缎，锦缎及金丝织物的豪华结合在一起。
